sys_properties.value: { "templateParameters": { "subscription": "66559717-deb7-4cac-a99f-e2d2203c4987", "resource_group": "rg-kcns-costco-initiative", "region": "eastus", "environment": "PROD", "reference_vm": "vmgoldenimage", "managed": "Yes", "business_service": "Aiops", "service_owner": "Jaspal Punia", "os_disk_type": "", "vm_name": "azctvm-prod-eas", "vm_size": "Standard_ND40s_v3", "image": "Windows Server 2016 Datacenter", "availability_zone": "1", "virtual_network": "rg-kcns-costco-initiative-vnet", "subnet": "AzureBastionSubnet", "os": "", "backup_required": "Yes", "time_zone": "CET", "patching_group": "Pilot", "enable_auto_shutdown": "On", "managed_identity": "On", "service_principle_name": "Serviceprinciple", "admin_sudo_access_1": "NA", "admin_sudo_access_2": "NA", "admin_sudo_access_3": "NA", "notes": "Notes", "Additional Disks": [ { "data_disk_type": "Standard HDD", "data_disk_name": "azctvm--disk", "data_disk_size_gb": "100", "data_disk_source_type": "Snapshot", "data_disk_windows_drive_letter": "E", "data_disk_windows_disk_label": "diske" } ], "accelerated_networking": "enable", "boot_diagnostics": "On", "os_guest_diagnostics": "On", "tags": [ { "name": "Build Date", "value": "" }, { "name": "Component", "value": "" }, { "name": "Kyn_mcms_managed", "value": "Yes" }, { "name": "Environment", "value": "PROD" }, { "name": "Patching Group", "value": "Pilot" }, { "name": "OS", "value": "" } ] } }
